feed.title: autobrr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.41.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • da532300775663af2d5f56ab370fb2c05bd65b46: feat(filters): validate existence of external exec cmd (#1501) (@zze0s)
  • facb5b25e5376dbf4a7c2f88f97b65665d4e6936: feat(indexers): Nyaa add trusted, remake and batch tags (#1482) (@Flupster)
  • 7cd5d99ae618852462b226d895b6590f7fb0e704: feat(indexers): add KeepFRDS (#1484) (@KyokoMiki)
  • b181231b12d0d7e2651cae1582f499238dcbc66b: feat(macros): add Artists (#1493) (@martylukyy)
  • 3c3b47fa10811210e1bc0f140bc7b64bc584c6d8: feat(macros): add IndexerName (#1511) (@zze0s)
  • c43e2c76d63317aa11dd63f1e517a7ae6cd2006f: feat(notifications): add support for custom Telegram api url (#1508) (@KyokoMiki)
  • 72ca7a8a4fc40562d3df153d57fe4fe1bb99876c: feat(releases): replace misc info in incognito mode (#1509) (@s0up4200)
  • f1b42146c1cd72199a87413d69775931e5cc75ed: feat(web): auto refresh dashboard stats (#1490) (@martylukyy)

Bug fixes

  • f26c33a961fd97ced69ee9398dabdca2ecbf51a0: fix(indexers): STC parse resolution (#1489) (@martylukyy)
  • b58ead74aad5ddd5e56e2cf0fe4d2a3f4fa23ff0: fix(logger): properly SetGlobalLevel on all levels (#1504) (@s0up4200)
  • 5857945e71ba1e83bb9681c36c468809ae1dcf82: fix(user): change username (#1502) (@zze0s)

Other work

  • 1b02add8423d8bf73a54111e00f45d8985ecec42: build(deps): bump rls to v0.5.12 (#1506) (@s0up4200)
  • 83f6d7864d05960adbcb2832a6cf9f6bd77069e5: build(deps): bump the golang group with 4 updates (#1485) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 507782960dd328000d56260fe7007902f96a35f2: build(deps): bump the npm group in /web with 23 updates (#1486) (@dependabot[bot])
  • b44d55ea5514f20876928ec9e80f12b113eb44e1: chore: add missing license headers (#1499) (@martylukyy)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.40.1...v1.41.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.41.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.42.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 56ef3a54020749f44a8ae2862641b1c5d891979b: feat(actions): qBittorrent add first-last piece priority (#1517) (@s0up4200)
  • f8715c193c88921f9beb60e18dee029544698ae3: feat(auth): improved error handling during login (#1523) (@s0up4200)
  • 0016228d899113c1af859505504f9a17b669f536: feat(indexers): add External Identifier to map with ARR indexers (#1534) (@zze0s)
  • 28172cfba6e1f551a828f78200075706e939559c: feat(indexers): add HD-Only (#1525) (@s0up4200)
  • 3202c6043db11e76055c2ae1d8ca98d4fcebc3a7: feat(indexers): update release baseurl on update (#1532) (@zze0s)
  • 19e129e55fdbf47c43cdf8cf467768994eb56330: feat(releases): delete based on age/indexer/status (#1522) (@s0up4200)
  • 3dab29538744f98f2c2186233577bc9f74d05620: feat(web): add theme toggle to navbar (#1540) (@s0up4200)
  • 190994c70b37ab39570e85e2569021d38181a5de: feat(web): set Safari window colors (#1543) (@s0up4200)

Bug fixes

  • 8120c33f6b83efb58880cdead009c11c64f21dc5: fix(auth): cookie expiry and renewal (#1527) (@martylukyy)
  • 56aa7dd5cb6d68bfa6193b6c98e7784d5be08a0a: fix(feeds): parse magnet URI from enclosure (#1514) (@zze0s)
  • d558db231ccdf741e4c6ed9483b23e893043a970: fix(filters): export not working with Safari (#1505) (@zze0s)
  • 9832076d7ef9bf09287c1eb233bdbdb287521065: fix(indexers): irc baseurl override for links (#1537) (@zze0s)
  • 3e7c436fe6ffcf8f10d553d4df5ca970b1a30139: fix(indexers): new IPT announce bot name (#1548) (@martylukyy)
  • 9d08f149b4b5706d1d4a74bf8d71b0e2358a3a9c: fix(web): disable pnpm strict version check (#1519) (@s0up4200)
  • 9c8c4a9ab2b36f4ab15c7857cba386bca5f00f47: fix(web): disable autocomplete on APIKeyAddForm and FilterAddForm (#1546) (@s0up4200)
  • 5945b51f36461e04e0fcb4731f34bf21bd8d3a53: fix(web): qbittorrent action rules spacing (#1544) (@martylukyy)
  • 5bae500a8651fa3cefba8f044f34f96557bed9d3: fix(web): responsive account settings (#1545) (@martylukyy)
  • 7134e06379ae2a77e597904e6a2014536d358b7a: fix(web): root pending component placement (#1547) (@martylukyy)

Other work

  • ad6ef228eca91d780412cd80fc323743bd57ae3d: build(deps): bump CatChen/eslint-suggestion-action from 3 to 4 in the github group (#1536) (@dependabot[bot])
  • f82006049261dba5ae3e6185f4e1a4e2219eac3b: build(deps): bump the golang group with 6 updates (#1528) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 575944de1ebc27f70cb41bcf4fe815c84c4dfe1f: chore(database): remove unused test func (#1465) (@kenstir)
  • ccff369f30acf8cf060868128115d3a2a8231a23: chore(indexers): danishbytes remove unused url (#1526) (@kbhsn4)
  • ce1729257388d02388de4789c68f48fbd82dcc9e: chore: add missing license headers (#1512) (@martylukyy)
  • 7b9993b2965085246be96bec4552a5cd151f7a1f: chore: bump pnpm to 9.0.2 (#1515) (@chenrui333)
  • 4311341b03a9c98d0973365e7baf937f93e185ea: docs: add macos homebrew installation (#1518) (@s0up4200)
  • 2f9b82ca4475964ba4679c4e4f46552c4d4b2b5d: refactor(apiclient): simplify query in release delete method (#1538) (@s0up4200)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.41.0...v1.42.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.42.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.43.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 4fceccd6115db00748b9e42cffefa3260f6c83ec: feat(filters): support daily shows (#1462) (@kenstir)
  • 3d6c4c09f5269b7259e46071f034718e7e09b2cc: feat(indexers): add BitHUmen (#1576) (@zze0s)
  • 099a41f61b266d9e31a7a19b25f872e8a6f68c7a: feat(indexers): add FinElite (#1562) (@kanyewww)
  • 5e88d08b35bb1b9f02b2b3c9100e42ad2ce53a41: feat(macros): add missing variables (#1541) (@MagiX13)

Bug fixes

  • 2a3dcfbf055d6e4316348b8ef6b6113c7e78259f: fix(auth): show correct error when providing wrong current password at credential change (#1549) (@martylukyy)
  • 1530e9516d7443f91921c87b4926d1bf5f1bfa63: fix(rss): use custom client for rss tests (#1557) (@Intuinewin)

Other work

  • 0bd8c1d97426641444a2cfa623df690ef5221c1f: build(deps): bump goreleaser/goreleaser-action from 5 to 6 in the github group (#1573) (@dependabot[bot])
  • f472859cb0337872b865a90626361d8e1990bebe: build(deps): bump the golang group with 6 updates (#1566) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 0841a1ce7c2cc7bb07582cab59b5661313f23e35: build(deps): bump the npm group across 1 directory with 23 updates (@dependabot[bot])
  • ef32e947697fc10120193cfe34426e93ff868942: enhancement(web): return more meaningful error message in toast (#1558) (@martylukyy)
  • 7821f7fb2f5f10351ecf210edccbced1595ced4b: refactor(web): headlessui v2 (#1570) (@martylukyy)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.42.0...v1.43.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.43.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.44.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 4f0e2d82b31068547f165872944fcbcecd4b3d52: feat(config): check pid for container startup (#1589) (@KyleSanderson)
  • 2881314ad422b8048d7a4b89aa1f316e530ce6e0: feat(filters): add SLOVAK language option (#1584) (@martylukyy)

Bug fixes

  • 6b3a4c5c63427c52720c1af61c0076cbf7b85b93: fix(indexers): FearNoPeer irc regex for music (#1598) (@zze0s)
  • 8f995006b14c595e394c1762e54693ac06c09120: fix(indexers): OPS log score parsing (#1592) (@ThyThal)
  • fe7709640e55f913a269d703e7795fb32561ac3a: fix(web): add notification panel (#1578) (@martylukyy)
  • a8590bfdc6f902bf7dd04fcbed60be65862f6d03: fix(web): redirect to onboarding (#1591) (@martylukyy)
  • f1fa2680a6417437bba7d8e627c05a1b5fafdd62: fix(web): tooltip placement (#1577) (@martylukyy)

Other work

  • c24f04f37c41a90563dc7fcb266ba3186be859c6: build(deps): bump docker/build-push-action from 5 to 6 in the github group (#1582) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 3cb18b013fcb38bf352ebd25b0c47527bb4c96b2: build(deps): bump the npm group in /web with 14 updates (#1586) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 6dc4965f2248615f5b95b37d4507126fb001224d: docs(install): distroless docker builds (#1500) (@s0up4200)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.43.0...v1.44.0

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.45.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 4b884ee859b724e0d71a6e024a5c3b29dc8c27a6: feat(filters): add validation for max downloads unit (#1618) (@zze0s)
  • cb2c62b353fc29aa674f0acd134ae3a011653370: feat(indexers): HD-Only add size (#1621) (@zze0s)
  • 21a8e27260b760f367d9c73bed4c51b94bfbb220: feat(indexers): add SATClubbing (#1617) (@zze0s)
  • ecffdc60ec217410cdb02876b9bc9b43ad6ab1db: feat(indexers): add SeedPool (#1625) (@zze0s)
  • de5953a007c26b7ec80ab9eae6974a920a67c1b8: feat(indexers): add iNSANE (#1620) (@zze0s)

Bug fixes

  • b9830f61b142322312b89fd448eeb6d537a87a78: fix(docker): update deprecated LABEL format (#1615) (@zze0s)
  • 59a10a910e50568f03c707e9a92bfa2755a74201: fix(feeds): implement staggered start (#1619) (@zze0s)
  • b2db1cc091c73209496e1ae03e5372cb65a5b87d: fix(indexers): HD-Only torrenturl (#1629) (@martylukyy)
  • 13b67b2fb0b5f8f112980af66a0ade51bffdede5: fix(indexers): adapt TheOldSchool regex (#1628) (@martylukyy)
  • abfac05b667eb1b220c6a2f730e86fa45e9b343a: fix(releases): retry action missing external indexer identifier (#1612) (@zze0s)
  • 9893290c3e665f965542b62c2496a413682eadfb: fix(web): filter dropdown cut off (#1600) (@martylukyy)
  • 3183e15a4b6871b023836a7a655680c103d8a160: fix(web): root pending component placement (#1601) (@martylukyy)

Other work

  • b0d5844018b1a6018c1956c7332de42030acbbb1: build(deps): bump the golang group across 1 directory with 9 updates (#1616) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 4eb012a03b09b5cad19530aa0aa8dfc066a7788c: build(deps): bump the npm group in /web with 14 updates (#1608) (@dependabot[bot])
  • e8e45c664d563015b6761a4785b8190e039eebae: refactor(web): rename custom components (#1581) (@martylukyy)
  • 7d7bf9ed4c00ac4dd5f5ad254206e7130e63e596: refactor(web): update deprecated HeadlessUI v2 components (#1580) (@martylukyy)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.44.0...v1.45.0
